contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.qandaqu.QAndAQuestionPageContent:
Hello,
I need to make sure all PDF's have the inline disposition header set.
I could not find where to set this nor could I find any docs online so any help is appreciated.
Thanks
---
**Environment** - Xperience by Kentico version 29.3.1 - .NET version: [8] - Deployment environment: Azure - Link to relevant [Xperience by Kentico documentation](https://docs.kentico.com)
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.qandaqu.QAndAQuestionPageTitle: How to set PDFs to open inline using CMSGetFileDispositionInlineExtensions?
